name: Stars
text: 0:0, inspire 1 (Next turn, gain 1 temporary mana)

name: Bone Knife
text: 0:0, your opponent discards 1 card

name: Cog
text: 0:0, build 1 (+1 to a robot in your hand, or make a 0:1 fleeting robot)

name: Crossed Bones
text: 1:2, fleeting, put 2 copies of ${144} in your discard pile

name: Spy
text: 1:0, create a ${143} in your opponent's hand

name: Mute
text: 1:1, restrict 1 (Your opponent can't play their leftmost unrestricted card next turn)

name: Juggle
text: 1:1. When played, put up to 3 cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck, then draw that many

name: Drown
text: 1:1, discard the top 3 cards of your deck

name: Sine
text: 2:4, starve 4 (Your next card gives -4 points)

name: Dash
text: 2:3, flare (Worth 1 less for every card in the story before this one)

name: Swift
text: 2:2, visible, if the next card costs 1, +1

name: Crypt
text: 2:2, your last card in the story transforms into the first card in your discard pile with the same cost as it

name: Gears
text: 2:0, build 2 (+2 to a robot in your hand, or make a 0:2 fleeting robot)

name: Cosmos
text: 2:0, inspire 1 + 1 for each card you play later this round

name: Fishing Boat
text: 2:0, draw 3 1-cost cards. (Priority for the cards drawn is deck top to bottom, discard pile top to bottom)

name: Factory
text: 3:0, build X, where X is the number of cards later in the story

name: Fruiting
text: 3:0, nourish 3 (Your next card gives +3 points)

name: Gift
text: 3:3, both players draw 1

name: Charcoal
text: 3:4, visible, discard a card

name: Paranoia
text: 3:3, sight 1 for each card before this in the story (Sight X means that you can see the first X cards of the story this round)

name: Hurricane
text: 4:0, set both players points to 0

name: Dinosaur Bones
text: 4:5, fleeting, put 3 copies of ${144} in your discard pile

name: Mine
text: 4:4, remove from the game the top 4 cards of your discard pile

name: Force
text: 5:6, flare (Worth 1 less for every card in the story before this one)

name: Tumulus
text: 5:4, +2 if your discard pile has at least 8 cards in it

name: Uprising
text: 6:3, +1 for each card before this in the story

name: Stalker
text: X:4, where X is the number of cards in your opponent's hand

name: Sarcophagus
text: 6:X, put the highest cost card from your discard pile on top of your deck, X is its cost

name: Anubis
text: 7:7, costs 0 if you have at least 12 cards in your discard pile

name: Nightmare
text: 8:6, opponent discards 2

name: AI
text: 8:4, draw 1. Costs X less where X is the total robot points in hand

name: Oak
text:
8:8, if you win this round, convert to nourish any excess points that you won by.
(For example, if you win 8 to 5 you get 2 points nourish)
